nodes.text: The Hatchery was a shop located on Market Row, a commercial corridor of the Port Town district of the mining colony of Cloud City, which floated in the atmosphere of the planet Bespin. The business sold exotic pets and food animals, and at some point between the years 1 ABY and 3 ABY, it was run by a Rodian named Tezli Odo.

The Hatchery first appeared in The Jewel of Yavin, an adventure module released in 2014 for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game. The shop is listed as a vendor players can purchase goods from, but no specific interactions are listed.
